dumb-list-keywords
==================

SYNOPSIS
--------

   dumb-list-keywords [<options>] [<collection>]

DESCRIPTION
-----------

dumb-list-keywords lists the available keywords in a collection.

OPTIONS
-------

-h, --help
   Show an help message.
-v, --verbose
   Be verbose.


SEE ALSO
--------

:doc:`dumb(1) <dumb>`
